column1: Little Goat Diner////My wait time on Sunday afternoon is 45 minute. They have this high-tech system where they will text you if your table is ready. They have 2 sections one for dining and one for a bar. I ordered Bull's Eye French Toast and it turned out too sweet for me. My bf doesn't like the atmosphere of the restaurant since it was too crowded
column2: loud and we got seated at the big table sharing our space with others. I have no problem with that but wish I could get a better seat. I might like it if I live around there it could be my regular spot but since I came here to see what the hive is all about I don't see anything much.
